author: Associated Press
title: China didn’t warn public of likely pandemic for 6 key days
description: The Chinese government may have waited on warning the public to stave off hysteria.
content: That delay from Jan. 14 to Jan. 20 was neither the first mistake made by Chinese officials at all levels in confronting the outbreak, nor the longest lag, as governments around the world have dragged their feet for weeks and even months in addressing the viru… [+13593 chars]
